phrases: So he is having an affair?
You are in junior high, figure it out, octopus!
I do not like your dad either.
He is got a kid and he is trying to get with a younger woman...
He is not fit for Akari... my big sister.
Your sister's the one who is tricking him!
I do not like playing dirty like you, Miuna.
He will not get away with that!
We will make him into takoyaki!
It is not a big deal...
You are really good too, Tsumugu-kun.
When did you learn how to cook?
It is always been just me and Gramps, so...
W-We do not need that much Chinese cabbage...
Let us all go around to the other groups and try their food.
What do you want to do?
Please... try this if you would like.
Like there is any way we could eat anything you sea people make.
B-But... there is not even any fish in it.
I said I do not want any!
My hand just accidentally bumped her.
Hey, what is going on here?
You are not going to eat your lunch?
I am going to go work on Ojoshi-sama.
Maybe we should try harder to get along with them.
With the guys that waste food?
It is wrong that the Ojoshi-sama was broken, but still...
Then who the hell did it?!
You are a little too excited today, so this is not going anywhere.
We will talk about this further tomorrow.
Hikari, you can go home for now.
I am the only one you are sending home?!
Am I the only bad guy?
I want to go home, so I am going home!
Manaka is really stubborn when she gets like that...
This is not coming off very well.
She is a scaredy cat, but has a strong will...
a gorgeous body... big, round eyes...
and she is always trying so hard.
There are guys who prefer bigger.
Apparently middle-aged men prefer it when girls are not so skinny.
Following with that does not help.
You should just be honest and be happy.
I really should be more honest like Manaka.
She is one of the mysterious grade school kids that has a grudge against Hikari.
That is a rather blunt criminal declaration.
So it was not the guys from our class.
Let us keep this a secret.
Let us keep this between us, Kaname.
Because if everyone else finds out about this,
Hikari will end up the bad guy.
I cannot watch Hikari being hurt any further.
Bad guy or not, it is true that it was a misunderstanding.
It is not a good thing to lie.
It will just isolate you even more.
They are people who were saying that our food smelled fishy!
They are really not bad people.
The people who purposely spilled the sushi bowl?!
I thought you were a good person,
but I guess you are a person from the surface after all.
Chisaki loses her head when it comes to Hikari or Manaka.
I love the ocean, and the people of Shishio.
So I do not want everyone to misunderstand Hikari
just because he misunderstands all of them.
I am sorry, could you say that one more time?
I do not want everyone to misunderstand Hikari
just because he misunderstands all of them.
I do not like playing dirty like you, Miuna.
You know they were making an Ojoshi-sama, right?
and ripped the clothes so that you cannot even tell it is Ojoshi-sama anymore!
You know, you are probably like an octopus.
You are going to call me an octopus, too?!
When they get scared by fish they do not know, they spit out ink.
But the ink is really good if you eat it.
Or would it be octopus ink?
I have never made that so...
What are you trying to say?
Hey, why did you bring them the sushi bowl in the first place?
You would not usually do something like that.
You are usually hiding behind us.
You cannot even make rice porridge by yourself?
I guess we can just put in some miso and cover it up.
I have caused you some trouble.
You have something else to apologize for, you criminal.
You have a kid and yet you are trying to get with my big sister.
The hell were you drowning for?
I have not been able to contact Akari.
She will not come to the supermarket,
so I thought I would come see her directly myself.
I borrowed some diving equipment from my friend,
but it kept filling up with water...
Where do you get off playing the sad victim?!
Uroko-sama, could you spare some sacred fire?
You are quite the sinner, walking over the servant of a god.
Despite how much I have cleaned up around here,
and despite all the things I have done for you,
I still ended up having a terrible time.
How long do you plan not to go to work?
I have been thinking about finding a job around here.
Though there is not much around here.
You are going to give up on him because his daughter did not approve?
You seem to know a lot of gossip despite being cooped up in here all the time.
It is only been three years since she lost her mother...
I can understand why she cannot approve of me.
The girl's mother was Miori, who lived in a house just off the rocks.
She was a real beauty with an enormous ass.
Despite Miori-san being from here, they treated me really well.
the family that I had admired.
It was the first time I ever saw her cry like that...
and it reminded me of Hikari when he was younger, and...
I wanted to stay by them.
I thought I could fill the hole that Miori-san left behind.
It is all about how you say things.
Miori was gone and you wanted to steal her place.
I would not mind putting a curse on you.
A curse to make you forget the man you fell for.
I will take care of this on my own.
Akari is still such a child.
There is only so much you can do on your own.
We cannot let the surface have the people of the sea right now.
I am the one who ruined it!
Why did not you get mad at her, Hii-kun.
Because it is not like I do not know how she feels.
After my mom died, if some other woman came into my house,
I probably would not have liked it either.
that I am always being protected
by you and Chii-chan and Kaname...
And I think that is true.
Uroko-sama says something good once in a while.
Tomorrow, let us go apologize to everyone together!
Even though they are going to have a lot to say in return.
And they will say a lot to me, too.
I want to protect you from now on, Hii-kun.
I am going to protect you.
I was supposed to be the one to protect Manaka.
But instead, Manaka protected me as if she were Ena.
I mean, I am sorry for thinking it was you that destroyed Ojoshi-sama.
Dude, he is totally on his knees.
I never saw anyone do that.
You guys were responsible for the sushi bowl, too.
You guys threw around the sushi bowl...
But I blamed you guys, and then chested you.
When do you actually go to school?
You are pretty much the one responsible for Hikari apologizing on his knees like that.
Hikari is my very dear friend.
And as his friend, I will not forgive you.
She is my... she is my really good, dear friend!
When I was in second grade,
But Miuna did not pick on me.
Then, people were picking on Miuna...
And I was sort of relieved...
that it was not me getting picked on.
No matter how much they ignored her...
Why are you okay with that?
Why are you okay with getting picked on...
Because they are people I do not care about, that have nothing to do with me...
And I do not care what they think of me.
I thought I do not care what people think about me.
I do not care if people hate me.
I wanted to be dear to Miuna.
Since you understand how dear someone can be to you, you can, right?
You have got snot coming out your nose.
Putting sama on the end does not make anything better!
You will never be able to replace my mom!
Dad is a man of the sea, after all...
Will you become a sea slug?
If you find a red one, what will you tell it?
